LanguageData.MFI_HuntersLodge.label: huntars loje
LanguageData.MFI_HuntersLodge.letterText: Ye's been invited to {0}'s {1} special little cabin. {2}. There is an outpost thar what with all them stuff youse need to make meals, and they want ye to come. If y'ain't thar in {3} days they'll torch the entire place.
LanguageData.MFI_SettlementBaseAttack.label: Faction base attacked
